item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，英国法律与通用公司搁置中国业务许可计划并裁员
item.description: 两位消息人士称，英国保险公司和资产管理公司Legal & General已经搁置了获得中国业务许可的计划，并将在岸员工人数减少了一半以上。【原文：British insurer and asset manager Legal & General has shelved a plan to obtain a China business licence and more than halved onshore headcount, two sources said, joining a list of global financial firms scaling back in an uncertain market.】

item.title: 央行政策大反转拉开序幕
item.description: 全球最大的央行正站在扭转一连串创纪录加息的起跑线上，但借贷成本的下降之路将与上升之路截然不同。【原文：The world's biggest central banks are on the starting line of reversing a record string of interest rate hikes but the way down for borrowing costs will look very different from the way up.】

item.title: 聚焦：更多投资者推动嘉能可在泰克交易后保留煤炭业务
item.description: 越来越多的嘉能可投资者热衷于让嘉能可继续开采煤炭，而不是将即将扩大的部门分拆出去，一方面是看重其财务前景，另一方面则是考虑到内部保留燃料对环境的益处。【原文：A growing group of Glencore investors are keen for it to keep mining coal instead of spinning out the soon-to-be enlarged unit, with one eye on its financial outlook and another on the environmental benefits of keeping the fuel in-house.】

item.title: 聚焦：意大利监察机构的人工智能员工之争凸显全球挑战
item.description: 意大利监管机构 Garante 去年在当地对 ChatGPT 采取临时关闭措施后不久，就试图通过聘用四名人工智能（AI）专家来加强其团队。【原文：Soon after Italian watchdog Garante took on ChatGPT with a temporary shutdown locally last year, it tried to strengthen its team by hiring four artificial intelligence (AI) experts.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：中国审查普华永道在恒大 780 亿美元欺诈案中的角色
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，在中国恒大集团被指控欺诈780亿美元后，中国当局正在审查普华永道会计师事务所（PwC）在恒大集团会计实务中的作用。【原文：Chinese authorities are examining the role of PricewaterhouseCoopers(PwC) in China Evergrande Group's accounting practices after the developer was accused of a $78 billion fraud, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞价日元和人民币感受痛苦
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 日本央行上田预计未来将减少债券购买，以显示稳步退出的迹象
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，央行最终将缩减债券购买规模，并允许市场力量决定长期利率走势，这表明他决心稳步推进超宽松货币政策正常化。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the central bank will eventually scale back bond purchases and allow market forces to set long-term interest rate moves, signalling his resolve to move steadily towards normalising ultra-loose monetary policy.】

item.title: 阿根廷美元债券屡创新高，米莱反弹势头强劲
item.description: 阿根廷以美元计价的国际债券继续上涨，2030 年债券周四创下历史最高收盘价，略高于 51 美分。【原文：Argentina's dollar-denominated international bonds continued to rally, with the 2030 paper posting its highest-ever closing price on Thursday at slightly above 51 cents on the dollar.】

item.title: 超过半数经济学家预计日本央行今年将进一步加息
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，半数以上的经济学家预计日本央行今年将进一步提高利率，最高可能升至0.25%。【原文：More than a half of economists expect the Bank of Japan will raise interest rates further this year, a Reuters poll showed on Friday, possibly taking them to as high as 0.25%.】

item.title: 欧盟领导人支持欧元区在 2025 年收紧财政政策
item.description: 欧盟领导人周五将支持欧元区明年采取略微紧缩的财政政策，以帮助降低通胀率，并使公共财政在经历 COVID 大流行病和能源价格危机的过度支出后更加稳定。【原文：European Union leaders will back on Friday a slightly tighter fiscal policy for the euro zone next year, to help bring down inflation and make public finance more stable after the excess spending of the COVID pandemic and the energy price crisis.】

item.title: 百事公司将再投资 4 亿美元在越南新建两家工厂
item.description: 越南政府周五表示，美国食品饮料生产商百事可乐公司已承诺向越南追加投资4亿美元，在该国新建两座以可再生能源为动力的工厂。【原文：U.S. food and drink maker PepsiCo Inc has committed to investing an additional $400 million in Vietnam to build two new plants powered by renewable energy in the country, its government said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，英国法律与通用公司搁置中国业务许可计划并裁员
item.description: 两位消息人士称，英国保险公司和资产管理公司Legal & General已经搁置了获得中国营业执照的计划，并将在岸员工人数减少了一半以上。【原文：British insurer and asset manager Legal & General has shelved a plan to obtain a China business license and more than halved onshore headcount, two sources said, joining a list of global financial firms scaling back in an uncertain market.】

item.title: 中国人民币跌至四个月低点，国有银行出手相助
item.description: 周五，中国人民币兑美元汇率跌至四个月低点，突破了关键门槛，促使国有银行出手捍卫人民币。【原文：China's yuan weakened to a four-month low against the dollar on Friday, breaching a key threshold and prompting state-owned banks to step in to defend the currency.】

item.title: 瑞士央行启动降息，亚洲股市大涨
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市接近一周涨幅，日经指数创下历史新高，在瑞士国家银行意外降息后，全球股市纷纷反弹，投资者纷纷猜测下一个可能是谁。【原文：Asian stocks were near a weekly gain on Friday and the Nikkei charged to a record high, riding a rally from its global counterparts after a surprise rate cut from the Swiss National Bank had investors wagering who could be next.】

item.title: 日本为历史性变化后的利率生活做好准备
item.description: 在未来几年里，Satoaki Kanoh 需要更换其位于东京的丙烯酸面板制造商的近十台老化机器，他担心这项重大工程将变得更加昂贵。【原文：In the coming years, Satoaki Kanoh needs to replace almost a dozen ageing machines at his Tokyo-based maker of acrylic panels, a major undertaking that he worries will become even more expensive.】

item.title: 投资者寻求 "套利"，美元岿然不动
item.description: 周五，美元将连续第二周大涨，即使日本加息也无法阻挡美元的涨势，因为投资者认为美国的利率很高，而且还没有下降。【原文：The U.S. dollar was set for a second week of broad gains on Friday, with even a rate hike in Japan unable to dislodge it, as investors figure U.S. rates are high and not falling yet.】

item.title: 香港森美国际计划寻求两地上市
item.description: 箱包生产商森美国际周五表示，除在香港证券交易所上市外，该公司还计划寻求双重上市，以增加其股票的流动性，并接触到更多市场的投资者。【原文：Luggage maker Samsonite International said on Friday that it planned to pursue a dual listing in addition to its listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange to increase the liquidity of its shares and to reach investors in more markets.】

item.title: 油价因加沙可能停火和美元走强而有所回落
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，油价下挫，原因是加沙停火可能临近，这可能会放松全球供应，同时美元走强和汽油价格下跌也抑制了需求情绪。【原文：Oil prices sank in early Asian trading on Friday on the possibility of a nearing Gaza ceasefire, which could loosen global supply, at the same time a stronger U.S. dollar and faltering gasoline dampened demand sentiment.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，美国数以千计的用户无法使用 Meta's Instagram
item.description: 据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周四 Meta Platforms 的 Instagram 出现故障，数千用户无法使用。【原文：Meta Platforms's Instagram was down for thousands of users on Thursday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 日本核心通胀率回升，物价走势趋缓令日本央行前景黯淡
item.description: 数据显示，日本 2 月份核心通胀加速，但衡量更广泛价格趋势的指数大幅放缓，凸显了日本央行多久会再次加息的不确定性。【原文：Japan's core inflation accelerated in February but an index gauging the broader price trend slowed sharply, data showed, highlighting uncertainty on how soon the central bank will hike interest rates again.】

item.title: 亚洲股市涨势不减
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 贝莱德：美联储鸽派中枢的 "惯性 "可能给长期债券带来麻烦
item.description: 资产管理巨头贝莱德（BlackRock）的一位投资组合经理周四表示，如果美联储的降息前景受到顽固通胀的挑战，长期美国国债可能会受到冲击。【原文：Longer-term U.S. Treasuries could be vulnerable if the Federal Reserve's outlook on interest rate cuts is challenged by stubborn inflation, a portfolio manager at asset management giant BlackRock said on Thursday.】

item.title: 联邦快递因削减成本上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 联邦快递（FedEx）周四上调了2024财年的利润预期，预计成本削减将抵消其最大客户美国邮政服务公司（USPS）需求的下降。【原文：FedEx raised its fiscal 2024 profit forecast on Thursday, expecting cost cuts to offset a decline in demand from its largest customer, the U.S. Postal Service (USPS).】

item.title: Reddit 用户对华尔街明星首秀投了倒票
item.description: 周四，Reddit 在华尔街首次亮相，股票市值飙升至近 90 亿美元，但在这家社交媒体网站最大的股票交易论坛上，评论者对这家亏损公司的股票前景表示怀疑。【原文：As Reddit's stock market value soared to almost $9 billion in its Wall Street debut on Thursday, commenters on the social media website's largest stock trading forums voiced skepticism about the outlook for the money-losing company's shares.】

item.title: 耐克因折扣吸引需求，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 周四，耐克公司的季度收入超过了华尔街的预期，因为其运动服装和运动鞋在假日期间的大幅折扣帮助其吸引了大量购物者。【原文：Nike beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, as deep discounts on its athletic apparel and sneakers during the holiday season helped it reel in shoppers.】

item.title: Lululemon 年收入低于预期，原因是需求疲软
item.description: 服装零售商 Lululemon Athletica 周四预计全年营收将低于预期，原因是消费者对该公司高档运动休闲服和配饰的需求疲软。【原文：Apparel retailer Lululemon Athletica on Thursday forecast annual revenue below expectations, hurt by sluggish consumer demand for the company's premium athleisure and accessories.】

item.title: FTX 预计美国将把破产索赔减少到 30 亿至 50 亿美元
item.description: 加密货币交易所 FTX 表示，预计将通过谈判把美国政府在其破产案中的索赔额降至 30 亿至 50 亿美元，不给股东留下一分钱，这与创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）声称 FTX 的倒闭没有造成任何伤害的 "鲁莽和虚假 "说法相矛盾。【原文：Crypto exchange FTX said it expects to negotiate U.S. government claims in its bankruptcy down to $3 billion to $5 billion, leaving no money for shareholders and contradicting a "reckless and false" claim by founder Sam Bankman-Fried that FTX's collapse caused no harm.】

item.title: 贝莱德对德克萨斯州撤资 85 亿美元感到 "沮丧"，敦促重新思考
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock）的一位高管周四表示，全球最大的资产管理公司对德克萨斯州一家州立基金从其管理的基金中撤出 85 亿美元资产的举动感到 "沮丧"，并敦促该基金的管理者重新考虑。【原文：A senior BlackRock executive said on Thursday the world's largest asset manager was "dismayed" by a Texas state fund's move to pull $8.5 billion in assets from its management, and urged the fund's administrators to reconsider.】

item.title: 耐克失去市场份额，投资者担心相关性
item.description: 耐克越来越依赖其标志性篮球鞋来提高销售额，但随着这家运动服装巨头的市场份额被新品牌夺走，一些分析师和投资者开始怀疑这是否是个错误。【原文：Nike has increasingly leaned on its iconic basketball shoes to boost sales, but as the sportswear giant bleeds market share to newer brands, some analysts and investors are wondering if that is a mistake.】

item.title: 西南航空运输工人批准新劳动合同
item.description: 西南航空公司周四表示，机坪、运营、供应和货运代理批准了一份为期五年的新劳动合同。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Thursday ramp, operations, provisioning and cargo agents approved a new five-year labor contract.】
